server error message: Server error, please try again later
session expired: Session expired you need to Sign in again
internet error message: Connection error, please check if you have an internet connection and try again
password validation: Password must contain at least 8 characters
password confirmation validation: Password Confirmation must match the password
create new account description: Please fill bellow information's to create new account in the App
welcome description: Choose the method that helps you log in
home note: Logistics is the application that allows you to request the delivery of any product or commodity, deliver it to the specified place and at the specified time, and track it from the place of the order to the place of receipt in simple steps.
pending order description: Your order is under review, please wait until the order is accepted
accepted order description: Your order has been accepted, the driver will started soon
driver started order description: The driver is on his way to the pick-up location
your order has been picked up title: Your order has been picked up
your order has been picked up descriptio: The driver has picked up the order
driver started delivery order descriptio: The driver is on his way to the delivery location
your order has been delivered descriptio: The driver has delivered the order to the receiver
